PERSONA.NAME: King Henry the Sixth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Henry is a young, weak monarch.

PERSONA.NAME: Humphrey, Duke of Gloucester
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Uncle and Protector to King Henry, murdered in his bed.

PERSONA.NAME: Cardinal Beauford
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Bishop of Winchester, great-uncle to the King who plots against Gloucester.

PERSONA.NAME: Richard Plantagenet, Duke of York
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of York. He wins the battle of St. Albans and marches on London.

PERSONA.NAME: Edward Plantagenet
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Richard Plantagenet, brother to Richard

PERSONA.NAME: Richard Plantagenet
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Richard Plantagenet, brother to Edward

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Suffolk
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He orders Gloucester's murder but is banished.

PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Buckingham
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An ally of Somerset and supporter of the King.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Clifford
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Supporter of the King, he dies in the battle of against York.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Say
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Loyalist to Henry VI, he is murdered by Cade's followers

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Humphrey Stafford
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Brother to William Stafford, dies fighting Cade.

PERSONA.NAME: William Stafford
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Brother to Humphrey Stafford, dies fighting Cade.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir John Stanley
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He escorts the Duchess of Gloucester into exile.

PERSONA.NAME: Alexander Iden
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A Kentish Gentleman who kills Cade.

PERSONA.NAME: John Hume
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A priest, organizes a witchcraft ceremony.

PERSONA.NAME: John Southwell
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A priest, organizes a witchcraft ceremony.

PERSONA.NAME: Roger Bolingbrook
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A conjurer who participates in a witchcraft ceremony.

PERSONA.NAME: Peter Thump
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The armorer's man, he kills Horner.

PERSONA.NAME: Clerk of Chartam
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also called Emmanuel. Cade orders him to be hung.

PERSONA.NAME: Simpcox
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An imposter who claims his sight has been restored.

PERSONA.NAME: Jack Cade
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A rebel and fugitive on the behalf of York

PERSONA.NAME: Margaret, Queen to King Henry
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: French-born queen to King Henry, she supports Gloucester's murder

PERSONA.NAME: Eleanor, Duchess of Gloucester
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Wife of Gloucester who is banished for using witchcraft

PERSONA.NAME: Margery Jordan
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A witch burned at the stake

PERSONA.NAME: Spirit
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Conjured up by Margery, John Southwell, Duchess of Gloucester, and Roger Bolingbrook.

PERSONA.NAME: First Petitioner
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Prepares a petition For Gloucester against the Duke of Suffolk.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Petitioner
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Prepares a petition For Gloucester against the Duke of Suffolk.

PERSONA.NAME: Beadle
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Brought in by the Mayor to beat Simpcox
